argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rdgfun | |- Fun rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ~P x ) , (/) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_df-r1 | |- R1 = rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ~P x ) , (/) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_funeqi | |- ( Fun R1 <-> Fun rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ~P x ) , (/) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_mpbir | |- Fun R1 |
| 5 |  | #P_rdgdmlim | |- Lim dom rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ~P x ) , (/) ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_dmeqi | |- dom R1 = dom rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ~P x ) , (/) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_limeq | |- ( dom R1 = dom rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ~P x ) , (/) ) -> ( Lim dom R1 <-> Lim dom rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ~P x ) , (/) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( Lim dom R1 <-> Lim dom rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ~P x ) , (/) ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_mpbir | |- Lim dom R1 |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( Fun R1 /\ Lim dom R1 ) |
